casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Isaac Jackson STROUD. No. 162P95-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Derrick C. Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Isaac Jackson Stroud, for Stroud, Isaac Jackson. Mr. Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 31st of July 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
